revised_title: A Study of a Variety of Thorianite from Galle, Ceylon
tldr: The authors analyze a variety of thorianite from Galle, Ceylon, and find that it contains a larger proportion of uranium oxides and less thorium dioxide than the ordinary form of thorianite. They conclude that the two forms of the mineral are isomorphous and that the intimate association of thorium and uranium in thorianite can be regarded as an isomorphous mixture.
